posts.excerpt:
In this article, you'll learn how to build a racing game in Python using the
Turtle library in just 39 lines of code. 

Here's what we're going to create:

Turtle Racing Game Project OverviewðŸ§µ Prerequisites
Very basic knowledge of Python programming will be enough to go through this
tutorial. Also, I assume that you don't know anything about this turtle
[https://docs.python.org/3/library/turtle.html]library. I will teach you
everything from scratch.
